## Quick Facts

- **Full Name:** Wanichanon Saelee
- **Profession:** Full-Stack Developer
- **Specialization:** React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js
- **Location:** Thailand
- **Website:** https://wanichanon.dev

- **GitHub:** https://github.com/N0Vee
- **LinkedIn:** https://www.linkedin.com/in/wanichanon-saelee-0b2717252/

## Who is Wanichanon Saelee?

Wanichanon Saelee is a passionate full-stack developer from Thailand specializing in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. He creates elegant, user-centered digital experiences and is currently open to new opportunities. He is also known by his online alias "N0Vee" on GitHub and Discord.

## Technical Skills

Wanichanon Saelee specializes in:

- **Frontend:** React, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express, REST APIs, GraphQL
- **Databases:** MySQL, Supabase, PostgreSQL
- **Tools:** Git, Docker, Figma, VS Code

## Projects Built by Wanichanon Saelee

1. **University Management System** - Comprehensive SaaS dashboard for university management with role-based access control, student management, and announcement system. Built with Next.js and Supabase.

2. **Wanichanon.blog** - Modern blog platform built with Next.js 14 (App Router), PayloadCMS, and a custom glassmorphism design system.

3. **Wanichanon.dev** - Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

4. **Guitar E-Commerce** - Complete e-commerce solution with admin dashboard featuring full CRUD operations and inventory management.

5. **Weather Forecast App** - Real-time weather application with location-based forecasting and interactive weather data visualization.
